title: Heterometrus longimanus
text:
Heterometrus longimanus, the Asian forest scorpion, is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="scorpion">scorpion</a>s belonging to the family <a href="Scorpionidae">Scorpionidae</a>.
Description.
"Heterometrus longimanus" can reach a length of . Body color is uniformly black. These scorpions are <a href="viviparous">viviparous</a>.
Distribution and habitat.
This species is native to southern Asia (Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, and Singapore), where it inhabits the humid tropical rainforests.
